    static boolean isCheck​(java.lang.String positionK, boolean isWhiteMove, int numTurn)
    isCheck is a function that tells us if the king(for white OR black, whoever turn it is) is in check/will be in check if moved to positionK)
    static boolean isCheckMate​(java.lang.String positionK, boolean isWhiteMove, int numMove)
    isCheckMate tells is if the king(white or black depending on whose turn it is) is in checkmate by testing all possible movements of the king to see if a check results for all possible movements It also makes sure that the king cannot get out of check by another one of the current player's pieces killing the opposing piece that is currently putting the king in the check position

    • printBoard

      public static void printBoard()
      printBoard is a void method to print out board no inputs or return

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main function does all of the calls to other methods to test for resigns, draws, and moves of the specific pieces
      Parameters:
      args - is where all the inputs come through

    • isPromotion

      public static boolean isPromotion​(java.lang.String currPos, java.lang.String newPos, boolean isWhiteMove)
      isPromotion check to see if a pawn has reached the other side of the board and is able to get a promotion
      Parameters:
      currPos - is the current position of the pawn
      newPos - is the position it wants to move to
      isWhiteMove - is a boolean that tells if its white's turn or black's turn
      Returns:
      true if pawn can get a promotion, false otherwise

    • checkEnPassant

      public static void checkEnPassant​(boolean isWhiteMove, int numTurn)
      checkEnPassant checks to see if any pawn is eligible to do an enPassant. If so, it's canEnPassant field is assigned the current round number, so the program knows when the pawn is allowed to enPassant(Only in the current round!)
      Parameters:
      isWhiteMove - is a boolean that tells if its white's turn or black's turn
      numTurn - tells us how many rounds it has been It has no return type

    • isEnPassant

      public static boolean isEnPassant​(java.lang.String currPos, java.lang.String newPos, boolean isWhiteMove, int numTurn)
      isEnPassant tells if a pawn is eligible to perform an enPassant or not
      Parameters:
      currPos - is the current position of the piece
      newPos - is the position the piece wants to move to
      isWhiteMove - tells us whose turn it is(if true, white; if false, black)
      numTurn - tells us how many rounds it has been
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if EnPassant can be done, false otherwise

    • isCastling

      public static boolean isCastling​(java.lang.String currPos, java.lang.String newPos, boolean isWhiteMove, int numMove)
      isCastling tells us if king is eligible to do a castling move
      Parameters:
      currPos - is the current position of the piece
      newPos - is the position the piece wants to move to
      isWhiteMove - tells us whose turn it is(if true, white; if false, black)
      numMove - tells us how many rounds it has been
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if Castling can be done, false otherwise

    • isCheck

      public static boolean isCheck​(java.lang.String positionK, boolean isWhiteMove, int numTurn)
      isCheck is a function that tells us if the king(for white OR black, whoever turn it is) is in check/will be in check if moved to positionK)
      Parameters:
      positionK - gives us the possible String position of the king
      isWhiteMove - tells us whose turn it is(if true, white; if false, black)
      numTurn - tells us how many rounds it has been
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if the king in positionk will be in check, false otherwise

    • isCheckMate

      public static boolean isCheckMate​(java.lang.String positionK, boolean isWhiteMove, int numMove)
      isCheckMate tells is if the king(white or black depending on whose turn it is) is in checkmate by testing all possible movements of the king to see if a check results for all possible movements It also makes sure that the king cannot get out of check by another one of the current player's pieces killing the opposing piece that is currently putting the king in the check position
      Parameters:
      positionK - gives us the String position of the king
      isWhiteMove - tells us whose turn it is(if true, white; if false, black)
      numMove - tells us how many rounds it has been
      Returns:
      a boolean, true if the king in positionk will be in checkmate, false otherwise

    • kingPosition

      public static java.lang.String kingPosition​(boolean isWhite)
      kingPosition is a method to find the king of the specified color
      Parameters:
      isWhite - tells us whose king we are searching for(if true, white; if false, black)
      Returns:
      a string with the position of the king of the given color

    • isBlackBox

      public static boolean isBlackBox​(int row, int col)
      isBlackBox tells us if the current box would be black or white if it were an emptySquare
      Parameters:
      row - gives is the row number
      col - gives is the column number
      Returns:
      true if it is a black box, false otherwise

    • getColInt

      public static int getColInt​(char col)
      getColInt is to find the corresponding integer to letter column field
      Parameters:
      col - is the character of the column
      Returns:
      an integer that corresponds with the letter of the column

    • getColLetter

      public static char getColLetter​(int colNum)
      getColLetter is to find the corresponding letter to the integer column field
      Parameters:
      colNum - is the character of the column
      Returns:
      a char that corresponds with the given integer of the column

    • toIntPosition

      public static Chess.position toIntPosition​(java.lang.String loc)
      toIntPosition gives the corresponding position object to the string location
      Parameters:
      loc - is the string position
      Returns:
      a position object that corresponds to the given string position
